description: A polished take on a classic straight-leg silhouette, the Prospect is fitted through the thigh and relaxed from the knee down. This version is woven with extra stretch for around-the-clock comfort.
fitting_details: The Prospect Straight: Our modern update to a classic fit sits below the waist and is trim through the seat and the thigh with a slightly relaxed knee and a straight leg.
Size 40W has a 12" rise and a 17½" leg opening.
Size 46W has a 12¾" rise and an 18½" leg opening.
Belt loops. Zip fly with a signature buttoned closure.
Five-pocket styling with signature metal rivets. "Polo" label at the coin pocket.
Leather "Polo Ralph Lauren" patch at the back right waist.
Due to the natural characteristics of this material, the coloring may rub off onto fabrics and upholstery.
